content.en: Graph-based learning: Researchers have been exploring various ways to optimize loss functions and discover novel classes in graph-based semisupervised learning. They have developed algorithms that use kernel smoothing, regularization frameworks, and normalized weights on data graphs to achieve these goals. Additionally, they have found ways to improve label diffusion, scale the learning process for large datasets, and achieve global smoothness and local label fitting. These advancements in graph-based semisupervised learning have the potential to enhance the accuracy and efficiency of machine learning algorithms.
content.da: Graf-baseret læring: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige måder at optimere tabfunktionen og opdage nye klasser i graf-baseret semisuperviseret læring. De har udviklet algoritmer, der bruger kerneludglatning, reguleringsrammer og normaliserede vægte på datagrafer for at nå disse mål. Derudover har de fundet måder at forbedre labeldiffusionen, skalere læringsprocessen for store datasæt og opnå global glathed samt lokal labelfitning. Disse fremskridt inden for graf-baseret semisuperviseret læring har potentiale til at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af maskinlæringsalgoritmer.
